title: ImportError: No module named torch
body_html:
installed pytorch from source on Ubuntu 16.04, cuda 9, nvidia 850m

(df) user@user:~/anaconda2$ find . -name *torch*
./envs/df/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch-0.4.0a0+d93d41b-py2.7.egg-info
./envs/df/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch
./envs/df/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/_torch_docs.pyc
./envs/df/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/_torch_docs.py
./envs/df/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/torch_shm_manager
./envs/df/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/include/torch
./envs/df/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/include/torch/torch.h
(df) user@user:~/anaconda2$ conda list

libstdcxx-ng              7.2.0                hdf63c60_3  
libuv                     1.19.2               h14c3975_0  
magma-cuda90              2.3.0                         1    pytorch
mkl                       2018.0.2                      1  
mkl-include               2018.0.2                      1  
mkl_fft                   1.0.1            py27h3010b51_0

numpy                     1.14.2           py27hdbf6ddf_1

----> 1 import torch

ImportError: No module named torch
